title: As If I Am Not There [2010 - Ireland] Bosnia war
description:
As If I Am Not There (2010 - Ireland)

Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1456477/


7 Award Wins & 4 Award Nominations

Ireland's submission to Best Foreign Language Film category 2012 Academy Awards.

A film about the appalling experiences of a woman during the Bosnian war in the 1990s. It shows Samira from Sarajevo, taking a summer job in a remote village as a replacement schoolteacher. She is rounded up with everyone else as part of a brutal exercise in ethnic cleansing and kept in an internment camp where she is forced to make sickening compromises in order to survive.


Video: XviD, 720x304, 25.000 fps, 1393 Kbps, 01h45m35s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, 6 channel, 448 kbps

DVDRip, Bosnian audio, English subtitles hardcoded

Optional subtitles Bulgarian, Czech, French, Greek, Italian, Polish
                   Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Spanish, Turkish
 
http://postimg.org/gallery/1ob1h11uq/
